Z2024047029.title: Header-sales experience in fintech
Z2024047029.content: AI Native in SaaS

W2880707081.title: 01  Markets Pipeline Dashboard copy
W2880707081.content:
01  AI  Cross-border Compliance Solutions
Flatfee
2025

This is an internal strategic tool designed for Citi’s global Markets division, aiming to unify frag-mented pipeline data across various business lines into a single, role-specific dashboard.

Through extensive user research and stakeholder interviews, we identified the diverse needs of sales, product, and leadership users—from real-time deal tracking to high-level revenue forecasting. 

The dashboard features modular, data-rich components including opportunity alerts, role-based analytics, and deal velocity breakdowns. By transforming raw data into actionable insights, the tool significantly improved sales team engagement, enabled better strategic alignment, and enhanced deal conversion visibility.

Check this Project  →

K3926630231.title: Header-sales experience in fintech copy
K3926630231.content: Sales Experience in Fintech

A2841610474.title: 01  Markets Pipeline Dashboard
A2841610474.content:
00 Government Bond Analyzer
Citi  Velocity
2024

Professional financial applications can present a considerable obstacle for user experience (UX) due to the complex nature of business operations and the abundance of data. CitiVelocity's (CV) fixed-income data analysis tools face the same challenge, as they contain millions of live market data, calculations, and financial metrics.

One such tool available to global institutional traders on CitiVelocity is the Govt Bond Analyzer, which provides a comprehensive data analysis service that covers both developed and emerging markets. It accomplishes this goal through the use of robust data visualization and professional calculation metrics, effectively interpreting exclusive market data. The project's main challenge is designing a user-friendly approach that caters to sophisticated business requirements while addressing the inherent complications associated with UX design.

J1465115079.title: 03 Loan Monetization Impact Evaluation Workflow
J1465115079.content:
03  Loan Monetization Impact Evaluation Workflow
Citi SMB
2025
In large financial institutions like Citi, loan monetization decisions can affect multiple business lines. However, stakeholders often lack a centralized view of its client-level impact.

To address this, we designed a cross-functional Loan Monetization Workflow. Sponsors can initiate a workflow to auto-fetch key client data. They may also send questionnaires to sales for additional input, enabling better risk visibility and strategic coordination.

Check this Project  →

J3353905303.title: 04 Intraday Credit Control
J3353905303.content:
04  Intraday Credit Control
Citi WCR
2023
This project comes in response to previous challenges where Citi was found to have violated 2020 consent orders by not maintaining an enterprise-wide risk management and compliance program.

To address these issues, our project conducts pre-trade risk controls for PSE, Cash, and Derivatives trades, supports whole market sales, ensuring compliance with Citi’s risk management framework. Through the intuitive dashboard and streamlined approval workflow, stakeholders can now manage exposures with greater transparency and efficiency, reinforcing our commitment to robust risk management practices.

Check this Project  →

K3607032579.title: 06 Plaza Lively Floor Game
K3607032579.content:
06 Plaza Lively Floor Game
NOWHERE / Seed Plaza
2021
Seedplaza is a smart community mall developed by Seedland, launched in Jingmen and Yongchuan. Unlike traditional malls, it reimagines social spaces through smart technology.

NOWHERE was invited to design an interactive game floor system integrated into the mall’s atrium. The modular, open design lets users enter and explore freely, with no fixed gameplay. Visual and audio effects are triggered by movement, blending entertainment with functional content like guides and ads, and encouraging spontaneous interaction.

X3927726767.title: 05 Nike Basketball Interactive Experience
X3927726767.content:
05 Nike Basketball Interactive Experience
NOWHERE / Nike
2021
Commissioned by NIKE, NOWHERE designed and developed an interactive basketball challenge for the Nike House of Innovation Shanghai 001.

Inspired by LeBron James’ signature moves, the experience features three challenge modes: Lay Up, Crossover, and Open Court. Players have 60 seconds to activate floor sensors and score by jumping and shooting.

Dual cameras capture key moments, and participants can scan a code afterward to view their scores, performance breakdown, system rating, leaderboard position, and download highlight videos in normal and slow motion.

I3444030817.title: Header-Digital Arts in Branding
I3444030817.content: Digital Arts in Branding

R2299649536.title: Header-my featured
R2299649536.content: My  Featured

P4151045667.title: 07 Tie-dyed Rivival
P4151045667.content:
07  Tie  Dyed Rivival
Chinese Bai Minority Community
2024
The Tie-Dye Revival project tackles a critical challenge in cultural preservation through innovative mobile APP design. It seeks to revitalize the traditional ti e-dye technique practiced by the Bai minority groups in Southwest China.

This app empowers a wider audience to participate in this art form through accessible customization options and playful dye process visualization game, fostering cultural preservation in a novel and engaging way.

X1870388550.title: 02  Sales CRM Redesign
X1870388550.content:
02 Sales CRM Redesign
Citi Firm
2025
This project addressed a long-standing challenge at Citi: Services, Markets, and Banking teams operated on separate CRM systems, leading to fragmented client data, redundant tools, and limited cross-business visibility for senior leadership.

The redesign unified these systems into a single, firm-wide CRM platform—integrating cross-business data, organizational structure, and key workflows, supported by insight-driven dashboards.

Focused on transparency, efficiency, and growth, the new system enables both relationship managers and executives to manage client relationships with a complete, strategic view—enhancing collaboration and driving business impact.

Check this Project  →

R0453706614.content:
01  Markets Pipeline Dashboard
Citi Markets
2025

This is an internal strategic tool designed for Citi’s global Markets division, aiming to unify frag-mented pipeline data across various business lines into a single, role-specific dashboard.

Through extensive user research and stakeholder interviews, we identified the diverse needs of sales, product, and leadership users—from real-time deal tracking to high-level revenue forecasting. 

The dashboard features modular, data-rich components including opportunity alerts, role-based analytics, and deal velocity breakdowns. By transforming raw data into actionable insights, the tool significantly improved sales team engagement, enabled better strategic alignment, and enhanced deal conversion visibility.

L0401917115.title: Information
L0401917115.content:
Hi，
it's Sophia～
陶雪纯


 A UX designer who gets a little too excited about simplifying complex workflows and aligning pixels just right~

I spent the past 4 years at Citi, working on WCR, SMB and other internal platforms. My day-to-day was all about translating vague requests into clear, intuitive user experiences. I love talking to users, asking smart questions, and delivering mockups that (usually) make developers smile.

I’m passionate about solving messy problems, turning user feedback into clean design, and finding that sweet spot between business needs and usability. Always up for a good UX challenge—or a good UX meme.

Let’s connect!

 thisisxuechun@gmail.com
 www.linkedin.com/in/xuechun-sophia-tao

R3830921788.title: :host(span){ display: inline-block; } :host { position: relative; transform-origin: center center; transform: var(--base
R3830921788.content:
08  Female Retraining Program
Qufu Women’s  Federation
2023
Launched by the Qufu Women’s Federation, this project leverages digital tools to enhance women’s engagement and visibility in society. It integrates public welfare events, online courses, community services, and citizen proposals into a unified WeChat mini-program, while also connecting with other social media platforms to amplify women’s voices. 

The initiative empowers women with accessible resources and a platform for expression, supporting their reintegration into the workforce and encouraging broader community attention to women-related issues.

J4112006442.title: :host(span){ display: inline-block; } :host { position: relative; transform-origin: center center; transform: var(--base
J4112006442.content:
09  Citi Tech Engineer Annual Report
Citi Tech
2023
To boost team cohesion across its global tech workforce, Citi launched a year-end interactive review for engineers in India, China, Canada, and the U.S. Using data from Jira and Bitbucket, it visualizes each engineer’s annual contributions in a personalized, engaging way.

Inspired by global travel, the experience features iconic landmarks as interactive checkpoints. Engineers receive a travel-themed email linking to a journey where they unlock customized performance summaries and messages through playful interactions—fostering connection and motivation across teams.

F3976918942.title: :host(span){ display: inline-block; } :host { position: relative; transform-origin: center center; transform: var(--base
F3976918942.content:
10  Before Wilderness is Gone
Pubilc Engagement
2021
This project aims to spark public dialogue on urban wilderness, challenge conventional ecological views of cultural landscapes, and explore the possibility of human-wilderness symbiosis.

It proposes three design interventions—

Street Installations on micro-wilds Nature -Reconnection Workshops Urban Foraging Events
—that scale from small ecological encounters to larger reflections on the mutual influence between cities and wilderness.

P0700590206.content:
11  Methane Daily: From Pasture to Plate
Public Events
2021
This project focused on the environmental impact of animal husbandry. Cows produce a great amount of methane every day, which is one of the main vital source of greenhouse effect. 

In this project, We explored different interventions for "cow's methane" through design, including

Costume Performance Methane Pool Public Events
